body.bibl: Dinno, Khalid, and Ephrem Aboud Ishac. “Canons of the First Ḥoms Synod and Their Modifications in the Fifth Ḥoms Synod ‒ 1933-1957.” In The General Councils of the Eastern Christian Churches: The Synods of the Syrian Orthodox Church, edited by Alberto Melloni and Ephrem Aboud Ishac, 369–413.
